content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to craft oak_planks before I can craft the oak_trapdoor, so I will move the oak_log into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: I have crafted the oak_planks, so I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft oak_planks, I need to place an oak_log in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the oak_log from slot 25 into slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the oak_planks, I will move them from the crafting grid to a free slot in the inventory (eg., slot 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft oak trapdoors, I need to place 3x3 oak planks in the crafting grid. The first plank goes in the top left corner, so I will move it from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: The second plank goes to the right of the first one, so I will move it from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: The third plank goes below the first one, so I will move it from slot 11 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: The fourth plank goes to the right of the third one, so I will move it from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: The fifth plank goes below the fourth one, so I will move it from slot 12 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 53, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_stained_glass", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 42}]
thought: I have crafted two oak trapdoors, so I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
